title: Matches are not counting in ARAM
body: I am playing ARAM with a friend and noticed that the objectives were not going up or counting. then realized the past like 4 games have not been updated on our match history. Anyone else getting this at all??

replies.body:
Hey TheMuLLeTMaN27,

NOC posted an update about the issue a few hours ago:
>Network Operations â€“ 4:58 AM
We are aware of issues with match history, end of games stats and Bilgewater rewards progress not working properly. We're currently investigating.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce
Same as well. My only guess is that we have to complete them by ourselves (as in not queued with any of our friends).
same here, can't even finish the TF quest.
